name: SpaceMail
description:
SpaceMail

Help Melmun Phil avoid, and fight back against deadly space pirates to recover as much mail as you can from his stolen ship!

Controls:

Left and Right Arrow Keys: Steering

A and D Keys: Steering

Enter Key and Left MouseClick: Fire Lasers

Gameplay:

Battle through different waves of pirates, each increasing in difficulty and variety of enemies to fight. Some pirates will drop mail when you destroy them so be sure to collect them (especially the sparkling ones)

Downloads:

The download files contains binary executables for Windows MacOS and Linux. Each platform has individual pck files that contain all the game data, so make sure you have the pck for your specific platform in the same directory as your executable file. You can copy this game to any other machine and it will function the same, just be sure to copy your game data file (stored in your AppData) if you wish to keep your high scores and progress

Latest Version: 0.1.0

Until the 1.0 release, mechanics and gameplay are subject to minor changes
